items.sentence: The bed I slept in last night wasn\'t very comfortable.
The bus is full. You\'ll have to wait for the next one.
Tom must be tired after working all day in the hot sun.
Tom picked up the TV remote and turned down the volume.
Tom plans to go visit Mary in Boston one of these days.
It\'ll take me a long time to finish reading that book.
I won\'t let you get away with the things you\'ve done.
The police found a hidden camera in Tom\'s living room.
I didn\'t know who was going to meet me at the airport.
Tom was fired because he often showed up late for work.
Tom was only thirteen years old when he came to Boston.
Tom was sitting on a wall and looking out at the ocean.
Don\'t forget to take the medicine the doctor gave you.
Don\'t you think Cookie would be a good name for a dog?
Tom couldn\'t remember what they\'d been talking about.
Tom found out Mary was stealing from the cash register.
Tom and I want to talk to Mary alone for a few minutes.
You don\'t have to say anything you don\'t want to say.
Get me a tube of toothpaste while you\'re at the store.
We don\'t want anything like that to ever happen again.
